# separatorInsetReference

**Instance Property**

An indicator of how to interpret the separator inset value.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var separatorInsetReference: UITableView.SeparatorInsetReference { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use the value of this property to determine how the value in the separatorInset property is interpreted for cells. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableView/SeparatorInsetReference-swift.enum/fromCellEdges].

## Customizing the separator appearance

- **separatorStyle**: The style for table cells to use as separators.
- **UITableViewCell.SeparatorStyle**: The style for cells to use as separators.
- **separatorColor**: The color of separator rows in the table view.
- **separatorEffect**: The effect to apply to table separators.
- **separatorInset**: The default inset of cell separators.
- **UITableView.SeparatorInsetReference**: Constants that indicate how to interpret the separator inset value of a table view.
